transcript:
Customer: Hello?

Executive: Haan.

Customer: Ji haan, Vijay sir baat kar rahe hain?

Executive: Ji boliye na. Ah, sir good morning, Sunil baat kar raha hun IndiaMART se.

Customer: Boliye Sunil sir.

Executive: Haan, kaise hain sir aap?

Customer: Badhiya.

Executive: Haan, aur business kaisa chal raha hai sir aapka?

Customer: Business chal raha hai thik thak.

Executive: Ah, sir actually main aapse pehle bhi connect karna chah raha tha aur main unko main try kar raha tha lekin main unka call nahi lag raha hai kaafi time se.

Bell toh ja raha hai sir lekin call uth nahi raha tha.

Executive: Hmm.

Customer: Leads vagerah sir bahut matlab kam consume ho rahi hain. Inquiry vagerah pe toh achcha response hai. Inquiry vagerah jo bhi aati hain woh aap dekh lete hain ya fir koi na koi dekh leta hai aapke yahan se. Lekin lead nahi consume kar raha hai koi.

Executive: Hmm.

Customer: Yeh samajh lijiye sir ki around matlab 30 din ho rahe hain. 30 din mein matlab lead ka consumption bahut hi zyada kam hai.

Executive: Hmm.

Customer: Toh ab yeh hai na sir ki jaise lead agar consume nahi hogi toh fir har week ka lead jo lead balance waste ho jayega. Aur dusri cheez yeh bhi hai sir ki inquiry ka flow bhi kam ho jayega fir.

Executive: Hmm.

Customer: Hai na? Toh abhi main ek ek data aapko bhej raha hun sir.

Executive: Hmm.

Customer: Ek second sir WhatsApp WhatsApp sir aap kholiyega.

Executive: Are kuch bolo mat main subah se phone pe chalu hun aap bol do bas sab mere ko. Thag gaya main mujhse call le liya maine subah se aap karo aap madam ko bolta hua lage tha aapse baat karne ko.

Customer: Hmm. WhatsApp pe dekhiye maine aapko ek photo bheji hai.

Customer: Toh isme jo hai na sir pichle jaise 7 din, 30 days aur 90 days ka jo report hai ki kitna jaise buyleads pe hum log active hain. Uska report maine banaya hai sir.

Executive: Thik hai.

Customer: Dekh leta hun main. Hai na? Isko sir aap ek baar dekh lijiyega aur baki isme dekhiye sir jo inquiry vagerah jo aapne matlab jo bhi aapne cities bole the local ka bola tha us pe toh hum log continuously kaam kar hi rahe hain. Lekin thoda sa yeh hai na sir jaise leads ka consumption agar band ho gaya toh fir system aapka activity nahi capture kar pata.

Customer: Hai na? Abhi jaise aap dekh aap dekh rahe honge sir left side mein jahan pe aapka name likha hai uske neeche 0 by 4 dikh raha hai yahan pe.

Customer: 0 by 4 ka 0 by 4 ka matlab yeh hua sir ki month mein char week jo hote hain, char week mein jo client hain woh ek bhi week nahi active hain.

Executive: Hmm.

Customer: Jaise 1 by 4 ka meaning yeh hota hai ki char week mein ek week aap active hain. 2 by 4. Sir ab ek kaam karo main suno hello sir madam ko call karo na aap.

Customer: Sir madam ka call hi nahi lag raha hai na. Call toh ja raha hai lekin main madam call nahi pick kar rahe. Maine madam ko message vagerah bhi dala tha aapko bhi dala tha sir.

Executive: Thik hai na.

Customer: Haan ek baar sir ya toh aap call pe le lijiye madam ko toh fir main ek baar connect kar leta hun madam se.

Customer: Mujhe sir ek baar haan mujhe sir ek baar mujhe ek baar hold pe dal dijiye aur madam ko ab ek baar call kar lijiyega aur meri baat kar. Main main abhi zara thoda fresh hone ke liye ja raha hun main woh fresh hone ke baad mein call karta hun aapko.

Customer: Achcha achcha thik hai sir aap mujhe hi call kar lijiyega directly hai na toh inquiry mujhe actually one on one inquiry discuss karni thi.

Executive: Thik hai.

Customer: Allah ki marzi hai dekhne ka phone hai. Chaliye theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Lead consumption is very low.

- Unable to connect with madam.

- Wants to discuss inquiry one on one.



Resolution:

- Executive acknowledged the issue.

- Executive said he will check the report.

- Executive said he will call back after freshening up.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back after freshening up.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, inquiry, lead consumption, follow up
